import React ,{useState,useEffect}from 'react' import { Wrapper, Container, InputsContainer, SearchBox, SearchInput, FilterSelect, FilterOption, SearchIcon, CardsContainer, CountryCard, Image, CountryTitle, CountryInfo, Info } from '../HomePage/style' import {AiOutlineSearch} from 'react-icons/ai' function HomePage(props) { const [countries,setCountries] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetch('https://restcountries.com/v3.1/name/brazil') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setCountries(data[0].flags)) }, []) if(!countries){ return
loading
} return ( Filter by Region Africa Americas Asia Europa Oceania {countries.flags.svg} ) } export default HomePage
